show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

header.title: Truth and Consequences: Hegemonic Mythologies in American Empire

title: Truth and Consequences: Hegemonic Mythologies in American Empire
content:
Mickey Huff with Peter Phillips Co-hosts for the Project Censored  show on KPFA Pacifica discuss Truth and... <!--more--> Consequences: Hegemonic Mythologies in American Empire with Prof.
As’ad AbuKhalil.
The program deconstructs the developing march to war in Syria.
They also interview Abby Martin of RT’s Breaking the Set on  9/11 and the propaganda of official historical narratives.
They also talk about the upcoming 9/11 film festival in Oakland (50 years of betrayal from JFK to today), more events in NY 12 years later, and ongoing corporate media censorship and framing in maintenance of American Empire.
